definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: This grave matron had several sorts of practice.
sentences.chinese: 這位假正經的婦人有好幾種慣做的事情。

sentences.english: It's that sanctimonious air that people can't stand.
sentences.chinese: 人們所不能容忍的就是那副假正經的樣子。

sentences.english: He spoke to her in a mock serious manner.
sentences.chinese: 他以一種假正經的態度跟她說話。

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
weary old body (colloquial term, used jocularly or irreverently)
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3
